name: Hallelujah Chicken Run Band
description: '''Hallelujah Chicken Run Band''' was a [[Zimbabwe|Zimbabwean]] band formed in [[Mhangura]], then-[[Rhodesia]] in the 1970s. The band was an early pioneer of a style of music called [[Chimurenga music|chimurenga]], from the [[Shona language|Shona]] word for “struggle.”
